name: ArtClippingOption
shortdesc: How the arts should be clipped.

property.name: OUTPUTARTBOUNDS
property.shortdesc: Output size is the size of the artwork.

property.name: OUTPUTARTBOARDBOUNDS
property.shortdesc: Output size is the size of the artboard.

property.name: OUTPUTCROPRECTBOUNDS
property.shortdesc: Output size is the size of the crop area.
